example.eg: I heard a sound.
They awoke to the sound of gunfire.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 声音, 动静, 响动

example.eg: Sound is the vibration of a substance such as air, water, or other material.
example.egtrans: 声音是物质的震动，例如空气、水或其他物质。

example.eg: His words sounded strange.  Is that the right word? It sounds wrong.
example.egtrans: 他的话听起来很怪。这个词对吗？听起来是错的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 听起来, 似乎, 仿佛

example.eg: My kids call it music, but their band sounds like noise to me.
example.egtrans: 我的孩子们称其为音乐，不过，对我来说那支乐队的作品听起来和噪音一样。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 声音和…很像, 听起来和…很像

dsense.name: sound as though, sound as if

example.eg: It sounds as though you could do with a vacation!
example.egtrans: 听起来好像是你亟需休假！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 好像, 仿佛, 似乎

example.eg: From what you say, it sounds like he's an unpleasant person.
example.egtrans: 根据你的描述，他听起来像是个不受人待见的人。

example.eg: He's in sound health for his age.
example.egtrans: 考虑到年龄，他算是非常健康的了。

example.eg: That's a sound idea.
She fell into a sound sleep.
example.egtrans: 她彻底睡着了，睡得死死的。

example.eg: Panic is not a sound basis for government policy.
example.egtrans: 恐慌并非政府政策的坚实基础。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 合理的, 理由充分的, 坚实的

example.eg: Buying shares in that company may not be a sound investment.
example.egtrans: 买入那家公司的股份可能并不是一笔稳当的投资。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 可靠的，稳当的，有赚钱把握的

example.eg: She's sound asleep.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 彻底地, 完全地, 死死地

example.eg: They sailed along the sound towards the sea.
example.egtrans: 他们沿着海峡驶入大海。

example.eg: I really like that band's sound.
example.egtrans: 那支乐队的音乐风格挺对我的胃口。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 音乐风格, 音乐类型

example.eg: An echo sounded in the room.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 产生回声, 产生共鸣

example.eg: Bells sounded throughout the city.
The firefighter sounded the alarm.
We have sounded the depths of the ocean.
This radio station is mostly talk shows with people sounding off about their pet peeves.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 阐述, 表明，说明，说出, 畅所欲言

example.eg: I wonder what Jason thinks of the plan? We should sound him out.
The little boy had difficulty reading the word, so his teacher told him to sound out each letter.
The church bell sounded out across the valley.

dsense.name: alarm bells start to ring, warning bells start to sound

trans_examp.trans_cn: 感觉不对劲, 心里拉警报
动物的吼叫声, 动物发出的声音

example.eg: When a plane breaks the sound barrier it produces a sonic boom that sounds like an explosion.
My computer's hard drive makes a clicking sound that drives me nuts.
Don't make a sound till he's gone - I don't want him to know we're here.
My clock makes a sound like a bird when it strikes the hour.
Being of sound mind, I hereby bequeath all my possessions to my husband and daughter.
The road was icy but our driver got us home safe and sound.
example.egtrans: 道路结了冰，不过司机还是平安无事地将我们送回了家。

example.eg: When they're sound asleep my kids look like little angels.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 酣睡的, 熟睡的, 睡得很沉的

example.eg: A good action movie needs excellent sound effects.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 音响效果, 音效, 声音效果

example.eg: All we can hope for as we grow older is a sound mind in a healthy body.
Most professional sound mixers do their work with computers these days.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 声音合成器, 混音器, 调音台

example.eg: He said he wanted to sound me out about his latest business idea.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 探寻某人对某事的看法, 打探某人对某事的观点

example.eg: He worked at the studio as a sound recorder and made good money doing so.
This sound recording of the band was made in 1940.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 音响设备, 音响系统

example.eg: When the watchman saw the invaders coming, he sounded the alarm to call for help.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 演说片段, 录音片段, 简短引述

example.eg: The soundtrack featured a lot of 1960s music.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 电影配乐, 音乐磁带, 音乐唱片

example.eg: The soundtrack was terrible but luckily there were subtitles.
Home cinema systems are equipped with surround sound features.
